doc.after: There are six countries with a majority of native speakers of English: the United Kingdom (97%, 64 million),[6] Ireland (94%, 4.3 million),[7] Australia (87%, 17 million),[8] New Zealand (82%, 3.7 million),[9] the United States (79%, 255 million),[10] and Canada (59%, 19 million).[11] These six countries are also summarized under the term Anglosphere.
